body_html:
If you consider the fact that we're not using JVM in any place it seems like an unnecessary effort. Java files don't compile to C-compatible object files, so there's no easy way to link them with the current code.

Additionally, I have no idea what benefits would Java extensions give you? If you need super high performance, you can go with C/C++/CUDA, otherwise all extensions can be written in Python directly.
